header.title: Developers
header.description: Welcome to the Developers' page! We wanted to create a webpage that would allow access to some important early-morning information to help you plan for your day.

authors.name: Gannon Guess
authors.description: Gannon is a Senior in Computer Science at Iowa State. He hopes to use the knowledge he gains from this web development course to create his own website.

authors.name: Boudhayan Chakraborty
authors.description: Boudhayan is a Junior in Computer Science at Iowa State. He hopes to use the knowledge from this web development course to create a great portfolio.
